entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 12:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: S 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with a few flurries beginning near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
